value:
$WmMPID_スリーズ声,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Hello, $Nu...$k$pCongratulations on your victory! Word
of it is spreading...even to where I
have concealed myself.$k$pThe rumors say you defeated not just
one, but two of Múspell's generals.$k$pYour strength grows...and I look
forward to the day when we can
finally meet.$k$pYou will find me to the west... I
will await you in the sanctuary at
Snjárhof.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|It will take us over two weeks to travel
to Snjárhof...$k$pThat region of Nifl has been
completely abandoned... All that
remains is ruins.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|But it is there that we can meet your
sister, Princess Gunnthrá, and
discover the key to defeating Surtr...$k$pWe don't have time to waste!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|They were no match for us. Let's
press onward.$k$p
